defs: = ಗುಳೂರಿಗೆ.
a mark; a sign.
the object to be attained; an aim.
a purpose; an intention.
a dividing line between two countries, states, etc. or the land along it; frontier ; border.
(masc.) a skilled archer; a marksman.
(masc.) an officer appointed by a king to head a department in the palace or a village, etc.; a headman.
the skill of archery.
the office, duty of the head of a department of a palace or of a village.
to achieve one's aim; to accomplish one's purpose.
to cause to be fixed as a target (to hit, shoot, at).
to cause to be fixed as an aim (for one's study).
to caused to be targeted as an object for insinuation.
to cause a person undergo punishment.
to fix an object as a target (to hit, shoot, at).
to fix something as an aim (for one's study).
to target a person as an object for insinuation.
to cause a person undergo punishment.
= ಗುಱಿವಾನಿಸ.
to become the object or aim for being hit (as by an archer, shooter, etc.).
to become the target-person to be punished, insinuated.
= ಗುಱಿಯಾಳು.
an officer appointed by a king to head a department in the palace or a village, etc.; a headman.
a children's play.
to point (a weapon) or direct (a blow, remark, etc.) so as to hit; to aim at.
(fig.) to direct (one's efforts).
to hit or shoot at the target (without fail).
a hit, stroke, shot etc. which hits the target perfectly.
a successful effort.
the act of hitting or shooting at the target perfectly.
to point (a weapon) or direct (a blow, remark, etc.) so as to hit; to aim at.
to put or set a target to be hit or shot.
to reach the (pre-determined) destination.
(masc.) a person, as an agent, servant, etc. who is entrusted with some work to accomplish.
(masc.) an officer appointed by a king to head a department in the palace or a village, etc.; a headman.
an indistinct sound produced in the throat as from anger, dissatisfaction, intolerance, etc.
a sound imitating it.
to breathe during sleep with a rough, hoarse noise due to vibration of the soft palate; to snore.
to utter a loud, rumbling sound as from anger or speak in a reprimanding tone.
a making of harsh sounds in breathing, while asleep as caused by vibration of the soft palate usu. with the mouth open; the act or sound of snoring.
the loud, deep sound made by an animal, etc. that roars; roaring.
(the throat) to make indistinct sound (while being cleared).
(such a sound) to be made.
(fig.) (one's time of death) to be very close.
(fig.) to utter harsh words, from anger.
(an itching to do something) to be felt.
= ಗುಱುಗುಮ್ಮನೆ.
without doing anything; without action; idly; inactively.
to keep oneself idly (i.e. without talking, without any action, etc.).
= ಗುಱುಕಿಡು.
(the throat) to make indistinct sound (while being cleared).
(such a sound) to be made.
an experienced woman; a woman of higher rank, standing or longer in service; a veteran woman.

a visible trace or impression on a surface; a mark - a) a line, dot or other distinctive feature produced by drawing, colouring, stamping, etc. b) a spot, stain, scratch, blemish, mar, bruise, dent, etc.

a sign, symbol or indication - a) a printed or written sign or stroke; b) a brand, label, seal, tag, etc. put on an article to show the owner, maker, etc; c) a sign or indication of some quality, character, etc. d) a cross or other sign made on a document as a substitute for a signature by a person unable to write.
knowledge (of something) got from personal experience or study of it; the state or relation of being acquainted (with someone); acquaintance.
the state of being famous; renown; fame.
a mark or symbol having an accepted; a signature.
a dark, crude sugar from the sap of sugarcane; jaggery.
anything that is round or globular in shape, as a ball.
an armour that covers the back and the sides of a horse or elephant.
(the surface of something) to become depressed; to become hollow; to sink; to sag.
to cause to become depressed; to dig; to excavate.
to become thin, lean or emaciated.
a hole or cavity in the ground; a pit; a depressed part or place; a hollow.
a hollow place within something; a cavity.
a sunken eye.
the part of a plough that cuts the soil; a plough-share.
an iron bar used to burn a mark on the skin; a branding-rod.
with a deep, rumbling, bubbling or rippling sound.
(used to modify the verb 'run') quickly; swiftly.
to make a deep, rumbling sound; (flowing water) to make a bubbling or rippling sound.
the bubbling or rippling sound, as made by flowing water.
with a sound (as made by a heavy object going suddenly under the surface of water).
a kind of unleavened, small sweet cake, made by frying in ghee or oil.
the sound that an owl makes; hoot.
a sound imitating it.
(an owl) to utter its characteristic hollow sound.
(any bird) to make its characteristic sound.
= ಗೂಟ.
= ಗೂಟವಲೆ.
a wild or untamed horse.
a wild, lawless person, often a member of a gang of criminals; hoodlum.
the act of a violent, lawless criminal; hoodlumism.
the jack fruit (of Artocarpus integra) in its very early stage.
the tree Dipterocarpus indicus ( = D. turbinatus) of Dipterocarpaceae family.
to be in a half asleep or dozing state or mood.
to be slothful, indolent or lazy, etc.
= ಗೂಗುಟ್ಟು.
any bristle-like fibre or fibres, as on the head of barley or wheat; beard; an awn.
the dry outer covering of various fruits or seeds, as of an ear of corn.
(an owl) to utter its characteristic hollow sound.
(any bird) to make its characteristic sound.

any predatory nocturnal bird of prey of the order Strigiformes, with large eyes surrounded by stiff-feathered disks, and a short, hooked beak, feathered legs with sharp talons and soft plumage, and flies noiselessly; an owl.
(fig.) (used as a term of abuse) a person of lethargic or stupid nature, and ugly look.
the flower of the plant Macarana indica (of Euphorbiaceae family); Indian lotus croton.
(loosely) the plant itself.
the long, hard part at the centre of a jackfruit.
a piece of hard material, as wood or metal, tapering from a thick back to a thin edge that can be driven or forced into a narrow opening, as to split wood, close a fissure, etc.; a peg; a wedge.

ಗೂಟಯಿಡು gūṭayiḍu (slang) to act without showing gratitude; to become an ingrate; 2. (sl.) (a man) to have sexual intercourse; ಗೂಟಹೊಡೆ gūṭahoḍe = ಗೂಟಯಿಡು; ಗೂಟಹೊಡೆದುಕೊಂಡು ಇರು gūṭahoḍedu koṇḍu iru (said in anger or sarcastically) to live for ever; ಗುರುಕೊಟ್ಟ ಜೋಳಿಗೆಯೆಂದು ಗೂಟಕ್ಕೆ ಸಿಗಿಸೆದರೆ ಹೊಟ್ಟೆ ತುಂಬೀತೆ? guru koṭṭa jōḷigeyendu gūṭakke sigisidre hoṭṭe tumbīte? (prov.) to get the fruit, one must work hard, rather than counting on the grace of god or one's preceptor.
any of the small staffs or rods fixed on side beams on either sides of a bullock cart, to which a frame of bamboos is fixed.

either of the euphorbia plants (of Euphorbiaceae family) with milky juice and minute, simplified flowers borne in cuplike inflorescences - a) Euphorbia neriifolia; holy milk hedge; b) Euphorbia nivulea; spiral leaf milk hedge.
a sectarian mark ( esp. of sandal paste), pointing upward, on the forehead.
a kind of net used for catching wild fowl and other animals (prob. a net supported by long, poles that can be planted ?).
a wild boar or swine (Sus scrofa) (esp. female).
the plant Tacca integrifolia of Taccaceae family.
its bulbous root.
ಕೋಟಿಕೊಟ್ಟು ಗೂಟಿ ತಿನ್ನು kōṭikoṭṭu gūṭi tinnu a proverbial saying emphasising the nutritiousness of the bulbous root of the plant Tacca integrifolia of Taccaceae family.
the jungle marking nut tree, Holigarna arnottiana of Anacardiaceae family.
its nut.
that which is kept or meant to be kept secret.
(collectively) a number of arrows shot as to fall on the target like a shower.
to shoot number of arrows together or one following another immediately.
to keep something from the knowledge of another or others.
to become a nest, resting place or house.
to shake, agitate (as a liquid in a container with a spoon, ladle, etc.).
a portable shelter consisting of canvas, skins, etc. stretched over poles and attached to stakes; a tent.
a thick cloth or canvas.
to set a tent; to set up a camp.
to build a nest.
to thrust a spear into.
= ಗೂಡಿಕ್ಕು.
to lie oneself (on the ground, bed, etc.) contracting one's body (as from cold).
to gather and pile up (at one place).
to clear or clean (a surface, room, etc.) as by brushing with a broom; to sweep; to broom.
to destroy complete; to erase; to obliterate.

a nest - a) the structure made or the place chosen by birds for laying their eggs and sheltering their young; b) the place used by turtles, hornets, fish, etc. for spawning or breeding; c) the silky or fibrous case which the larvae of certain insects spin about themselves for shelter during the pupa stage; a cocoon.
a cozy, hole in the ground with a very narrow entrance where a colony of ants live in.
a small house or box with compartments for nesting pigeons, usu. on a pole; a dove-cote.
a small structure for housing fowls.
a place where domestic or wild bees live together; a natural or artificial hive.
a small house, inadequate to live in.
a recess or hollow in a wall, for keeping things.
a small structure made of usu. waist-high posts in which persons appear before a magistrate or a judge in a court of law stand for giving their statements.
an earthen or metal bowl-type structure to hold burning coals or charcoal, used for cooking; a portable brazier; a charcoal stove.
the (human) body.
the faculty in living beings that thinks, perceives, feels, etc.; the mind.
the bony frame work of a human being or other vertebrate animal; a skeleton.
a hollow made on the surface of a jewellery to set in a gem.
(usu.) a conical structure made of harvested crop before being threshed.
a temporary structure of raw bricks, limestone, etc. for baking; a brick or limestone kiln.
ಗೂಡು ಬಿಟ್ಟು ಬರು gūḍu biṭṭu baru (fig.) to come out from seclusion (to mingle with other).
to build a nest.
to become so thin that the breastbones to be seen as bulged or protuberated out.
= ಗೂಡುಕಟ್ಟು.
a lock or other device used to lock a bird-nest.
to enter into a nest.
to be housed; to dwell.
to become a house for; to house (something within oneself).
to hide (oneself); to keep (oneself) away from being seen.
to feel deep, acute sorrow or distress; to mourn; to grieve.
a pipe having a socket at one end for the mouth of another pipe can be set in as to make a continuous passage for air, liquid, powder, etc. to flow in.
to cause to (a bird etc.) to take shelter in a nest; to provide shelter.
to keep something from otheṛs sight or notice; to hide (something).
a lamp lighted and raised on a pole in the air at the Dīpāvaḷi festival.
the tree Madhuca indica ( = Bassia latifolia) of Sapotaceae family; Indian butter tree.
= ಗೂಡುಮುರಿ.
to fix an object as a target (to hit, shoot, at).
to target a person as an object for insinuation.
to cause a person undergo punishment.
the tree Ficus gibbosa ( = Urostigma volubile) of Moraceae family; stone fig tree.
its fig.
to thresh the piled up crop.
the plant Dolichandrone falcata of Bignoniaceae family.
its trumpet-like flower.
a kind of net used for catching wild fowl and other animals.
(the heart) to throb, pulsate, palpitate.
to become so thin that the breastbones to be seen as bulged or protuberated out.
an insect in the non-feeding stage of development between the last larval and adult forms, characterised by many anatomical changes and, often, by enclosure in a cell or cocoon; a case-worm.
a large container made of interwoven bamboo strips.
the amount that such a basket can hold.
a device with a (leather) container, working on a pivot, used to lift water from a well; a water-lift.
ಗೂಡೆಯ ಗದ್ದೆ gūḍeya gadde a paddy field fed by water-lift.
(dial.) a young woman; a girl.
the annual plant Lycopersicon lycopersicum ( = L. esculentum) of Solanaceae family; tomato plant.
its red or yellowish fruit with a juicy pulp, used as a vegetable; tomato.
the tree Murraya koenigii ( = Bergera koenigii) of Rutaceae family, leaves of which are used for seasoning food; curry-leaf tree.
a small, slightly flat basket type, water craft propelled by oars.
to lift water using ಗೂಡೆ (ಗೂಡೆ1 sense-3).
a structure with a small opening on one side, and a chimney for the smoke to go out, used for baking bread, biscuits, etc.; a bakery-oven.
hidden; concealed; kept out of sight.
beyond general knowledge or understanding; mysterious; esoteric; secret.
undergone change in form or look; transformed; metamorphosed.
something known only to a certain person or persons and purposely kept from the knowledge of others; a secret.
something not revealed, understood or explained; a mystery.
a man who conceals or keeps secret.
(a secret) to get revealed, exposed.
(rhet.) a particular manner in a verse in which the words used in the fourth line are variedly distributed in the first three lines.
= ಗೂಢಚಾರ.
the act of spying; the profession of a spy.
a man who keeps close and secret watch on another or others; a detective; a spy.
a man employed by a government to get secret information about or monitor the affairs, plans, armed forces, etc. of another government; a spy; an intelligence agent; an emissary.
= ಗೂಢಚಾರ.
the use of spies a) by a government to learn the military secrets of other nations; b) in industry or commerce to learn the secrets of other companies; espionage.
the profession and duties of a spy.
a woman whokeeps close and secret watch on another or others; a detective; a spy.
a woman employed by a government to get secret information about or monitor the affairs, plans, armed forces, etc. of another government; an intelligence agent; an emissary.
he who does not know who his father is.
a man with a strong shoulder.
the quality or fact of (something) being secret.
the quality or fact of being not understood.
the quality of being inexplicable; mystery.
a microscopic opening the epidermis of the leaves of a plant; a cryptostoma.
a word the sense of which cannot be made out.
a snake.
Ādiśeṣa, the mythological king of serpents.
a snake.
= ಗೂಢಚಾರ.
= ಗೂಢಚಾರ.
an artificial system of communication, using ambiguous words or baffling gestures, used for conveying secret messages among a restricted number of persons.
something written in code or cipher; cryptogram.
any of the symbols, codes used in such a writing.
= ಗೂಢಲಿಪಿ.
a cooperating secretly; a secret association.
(gram.) any of the four complex vowels ಏ, ಐ, ಓandಔ, that are treated as a single one in the alphabet system; a diphthong.
an animal that can withdraw its external organs as head, leg, etc.; a turtle; a tortoise.
(rhet.) a manner of communication in which the words are addressed not to the person intended but to a third person.
waste matter from the bowels; excrements; faeces.
= ಗೂಥ.
the prolapsus of the terminal part of the large intestine, out of the anus.
a disease causing this.
the annual plant Lycopersicon lycopersicum ( = L. esculentum) of Solanaceae family; tomato plant.
its red or yellowish fruit with a juicy pulp, used as a vegetable; tomato.
a man suffering from the prolapsus of the terminal part of the large intestine.
= ಗೂಥ.
the opening at the lower end of the alimentary canal; the anus.
abnormal curvature of the spine resulting in a hump; a humped, deformed back; kyphosis.
the condition of being crooked; crookedness.
a hump-backed man.
the quality, condition or fact of being dwarfish; dwarfishness.
waste matter discharged from the bowels; faeces.
a woman with abnormal curvature of the spine; a hump-backed woman.
abnormal curvature of the spine resulting in a hump; a humped, deformed back; kyphosis.
the condition of being crooked; crookedness.
the large whale, Megaptera novaeangliae of Balaenopteridae family with a well developed dorsal fin and longitudinal furrows on its belly and a raised, rounded back; hump-back whale.
a humped, deformed back; hump-back.
the soft, white, new growth from a coconut planted in the ground, (before the tender leaves are sprouted).

any predatory nocturnal bird of prey of the order Strigiformes, with large eyes surrounded by stiff-feathered disks, and a short, hooked beak, feathered legs with sharp talons and soft plumage, and flies noiselessly; an owl.
(fig.) (used as a term of abuse) a person of lethargic or stupid nature, and ugly look; a contemptible person; a toad.
(fig.) (an abusive term) a person who does not mingle with others but sits alone and spends time.
ಗೂಬೆ ಕೂರಿಸು gūbe kūrisu (fig.) to accuse another (often, an innocent person) of being fault; to place responsibility for (an error, mistake, fault, etc.) on someone or something (as a system).
an eye, that can turn on all sides.
an eye or a person, having imperfect vision in day light.
a very dark night in which only owls can see.
the plant Sida rhombifolia ( = S. canariensis, = S. rhomboidea) of Malvaceae family.
(fig.) an idle, sluggish life.
a life (of a person) having a long span, esp. being alone.
a slothful, indolent man hot having the tendency to exert himself.
a stupid man.
a slothful, indolent woman hot having the tendency to exert herself.
a stupid woman.
a try, esp. a hard try; attempt; effort.
an earnest attempt or effort; an endeavour.
a usu. chronic allergic respiratory disease, characterised by wheezing, coughing, often with paroxysms of difficult breathing, caused by an allergy to inhaled substances, stress, etc.; asthma.
to dig the earth with the horn or tusk (as a bull, wild pig, etc.).
to throw things all over, as while searching, impatiently or in anger, for something; to scatter; to dishevel.
to expel air suddenly and noisily from the lungs through the glottis, either as the result of an involuntary muscular spasm in the throat or to clear the air passages; to cough.
to dig or turn up the earth with the horn or tusk (as a bull, wild pig, etc.).
= ಗೂರಲು.
the sound made by birds taking flight suddenly (as from fear, etc.).
the niger plant Guizotia abyssinica of Asteraceae family.
its seed.
the state Gujarat in the western part of India, with Gandhinagar as its capital.
a man of, from or primarily belonging to that state.
in Karnāṭaka music system, a mode derived from the main mode Māyāmāḷavagauḷa.
to make a rumbling sound, as the waves of the sea or flood.
the plant Cryptocarya wightiana of Lauraceae family; Brazilian nutmeg.
any of the birds of the Columbidae family (order: Columbiformes) (esp. the smaller species) with a small head, plump body, long, pointed wings and short legs; dove.
a kind of perfume.
the palm tree Areca Catechu of Arecaceae family.
a useless person.
a heavy stroke or punch.
= ಗೂಸ.
the act of hiding, concealing something.
secret; not known; kept from the knowledge of.
that which is kept or meant to be kept secret.
a kind of thorny plant.
= ಗೂಳೆಯ.
a male cattle; an ox; a bull.
a bull left, in the name of god, to wander at its will.
anything that is hefty.
a thick head-louse.
a man regarded as like a bull in size, strength, etc.
a basket for catching fish in a small stream or canal.
a fight between two bulls.
a fight with a bull.
= ಗೂಳೆಯ.
to fight like a bull; to fight bravely.
= ಗೂಳಿಕಾಳಗ.
= ಗೂಳೆಯ.
a man who has left or leaving his original place of living to settle in another.
a kind of fish.

the act of leaving the region, town, village where one normally lives to settle in another, permanently or for a relatively longer period (esp. necessitated by famine, disaster, etc. or by threat or coercion); immigration.
a collection of several persons, things, animals, etc. together at a place of time; a crowd, multitude.
= ಗೂಳೆಯಹೋಗು.
= ಗೂಳೆಯಹೋಗು.
= ಗೂಳೆಯಹೋಗು.
= ಗೂಳೆಯಹೋಗು.
to cause (another or others) to leave original place of living; to drive away to another place.
to immigrate, en masse , from the normal place of living, to settle in another, permanently or for a relatively longer period (esp. necessitated by famine, disaster, etc. or by threat or coercion).
= ಗೂಳೆಯಹೋಗು.
a person engaged in trade by exchanging goods without using money; a barterer.
to trade by exchanging goods or services without using money; to barter.
the strong-smelling bulb of the plant Allium sativum of Liliaceae family, made up of small sections called cloves, used as seasoning in meats, salads, etc.; garlic.
the plant itself.
a man wanting or taking all that one can get, with no thought of otherś needs or desires more than he needs or deserves; an avaricious, greedy man.
any of various accipitrine birds with long, pointed wings and, usu., a forked tail which prey esp. on insects, reptiles, and small mammals; a kite.
the keen sight of or as of a kite.
a probing, discerning look.
an avaricious, greedy look.
a disease with inflammation of the joints, as a result of excess uric acid salts in the blood; gout; arthritis.
a cow that has calved its first calf (till the second one is born).
a building where a person or family normally lives in; a dwelling place; a house.
the internal affairs, as maintenance of law and order, etc., of a country.
a married woman, whose principal occupation is managing a household and taking care of domestic affairs.
a petty quarrel or quarrels amongst the members of a family or group of persons associated for a common purpose; domestic bickering.
the secretary of the government in charge of the Home Department.
the work involved in housekeeping, such as cleaning, cooking, and laundering.
the management of domestic affairs or affairs related to one's family.
an industry, esp. manufacturing activity, carried on wholly in a small scale at home; home-industry.
a kind of reptile of Squamata order, with a long slender body and tail, scaly skin, four legs, lives on small insects in hot region; a house lizard.
a falling down, disintegration of a family; the ruin of a house.
the department of a government in charge of maintenance of internal law and order and other domestic affairs; home-ministry.
a dog, that guards the house.
= ಗೃಹಕೋಕಿಳ.
= ಗೃಹಕೋಕಿಳ.
one who supervises the household servants.
any of the members of a family.
a bundle of long, stiff fibres or straws (originally twigs of broom) fastened to a long handle and used for sweeping the house-floor; a domestic broom.
a break or rift among family members.
a quitting or departing from one's house (permanently).
the act of quitting or departing from one's house, abandoning family life, esp. to become an ascetic.
a female servant who does housework, such as cleaning, cooking, laundering, etc.
an oblong pool in the premises of a palace.
the traditional tutelary deity of a family.
(fig.) the mistress of a family (a respectful term for a mistress).
a traditional set of social and religious rules considered as wise, expedient or prudent for the conduct of the household affairs.
the man who is the head of a family and who maintains the family affairs.
a man having a wife and children; a householder.
the priest in charge of managing the conduct of a sacrifice.
the head of a village.
the superintendent of the domestic affairs of a family.
= ಗೃಹಕೋಕಿಳ.
the ceremonial beginning of the construction of a house.
the ceremonial going into a newly constructed house.
an instance of this and the rituals observed on that occasion.
the formal entrance of a bride in to her husbaṇḍs house.
a shutting, closing or locking of a house.
detention, under guard, of an arrested person in that person's own home, a hospital, etc.; house-arrest.
the small finch-like bird, Passer domesticus, of Ploceidae family, with brown and grey plumage; a house sparrow.
the main lamp of a house.
a piece of land meant for constructing a house on; a house-site.
a person who ruins a family or families, by creating rift among the family members.
the minister of a government who is in charge of maintenance of law and order, and domestic affairs of the state.
the chief of domestic servants.
the mother of one's wife; a mother-in-law.
(collectively) the utensils, implements, furniture, etc. of a house.
a religious sacrifice or daily ritual a house-holder has to observe.
a house-holder who is obliged by the religious code to conduct domestic sacrifices regularly.
a man who guards a house.
a member of the organised paramilitary team employed by government for this purpose; home-guard.
the guarding of a house, palace, etc.
the mistress of a house, likened to the Goddess of Wealth.
the garden attached to a house used as a private pleasure-garden or in which vegetables, flowers are grown.
a royal officer in charge of the private pleasure garden of the palace.
= ಗೃಹವನ.
the science of management of home affairs; home science.
= ಗೃಹಮಹತ್ತರ.
the art of treating, curing, and preventing simple diseases, relieving pain, and improving and preserving health, at home by the knowledge acquired by experience or by traditional system.
a rite performed for driving an evil spirit or spirits out and purify a house.
a female of domesticated parrot.
a person whose profession is designing and drawing up plans for houses; a house-architect.
beauty, attractiveness, aesthetic appeal of a house.
a ritualistic act to religiously purify a house.
the act of arranging household materials in the bridegroom's room at the time of marriage.
= ಗೃಹಮಂತ್ರಿ.
a married man.
a decent, socially amicable man; a patrician.
the conventional or religious code of conduct that a married man has to follow; the duties and obligations of a householder.
the second of the four stages in the life of a brāmhaṇa, i.e. fulfilling the duties and obligations of a householder.
the condition of being or duties of, a householder.
propriety of conduct; proper behaviour, modesty, courtesy etc.
the pillar of a house.
the wife of a householder; the mistress of a house.
(Jain.) a mythological tree that is supposed to grant the desired kind of house.
the yard surrounding, surrounded by a house; a house-yard.
the inner apartment or apartments of a house.
a small opening in the upper part of the wall of a house to drive out foul air and bring in fresh air; a ventilator.
= ಗೃಹಾಂಗಣ.
the traditional tutelary deity of a family.
= ಗೃಹಪತಿ.
= ಗೃಹಮಹತ್ತರ.
= ಗೃಹಾಂತರಾಳ.
= ಗೃಹವನ.
a length of wood, masonry, etc. along the bottom of a doorway; the door-sill or threshold.
= ಗೃಹಸ್ಥಾಶ್ರಮ.
= ಗೃಹಸ್ಥ.
the wife of a householder; the mistress of a house.
the state of being or status of, a housewife.
the state or fact of being a householder.
